name: telekinetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having an ability to move objects, or to make them change shape, using only the power of the mind: telekinetic powers See
telekinesis
More examplesFewer examplesThe idea of people with telekinetic or telepathic powers frightens me a little.She claims she is telekinetic and so has the power to make things happen through thought-transmission.The film features a party with barmen who can mix drinks using only their telekinetic powers. The younger sister, Emily, was claimed to have telekinetic abilities and to move furniture in the house without intending to.
